name: test_e2e_with_logs[SQLI_BOOL_002]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BOOL_002` |
| **Name** | Boolean injection with comment |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | boolean_based_blind |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' OR 1=1 --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20OR%201%3D1%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Rule Mapping

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Rule ID** | `ADV_SQLI_002` |
| **Expected Rule** | Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection |
| **Actual Rule** | [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_BOOL_002-1765110920544-cktyv6 pattern_id=SQLI_BOOL_002 uri=/?q=%27%20OR%201%3D1%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET |
| **Match Status** | `MATCH` |

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1

- **Timestamp**: 12:35:20.000 UTC
